{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_FAxeCheckReady}} '''A_FAxeCheckReady'''
(no parameters) Calls [[A_WeaponReady]] and checks if the current weapon has enough ammo. If so, jumps to its ReadyGlow state. It's an equivalent of doing the following, in {{Class|FWeapAxe|Timon's Axe}} ready state: FAXE A 0 [[A_JumpIfInventory]] ("{{Class|Mana1}}", 1, "ReadyGlow") FAXE A 1 [[A_WeaponReady]] loop This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FWeapAxe}} and derived classes. [[Category:Decorate Restricted functions]][[Category:Decorate Hexen functions]][[Category:Decorate Weapon functions]]{{DEFAULTSORT:FAxeCheckReady}}
